text:
@davidfrawleyved Exactly.Dr Tedros must apologise to the World and resign from the director post WHO immediately, for his inability in not maintaining the health of the World in general,and not containing coronavirus COVID-19 in particular.

Let the efficient and non partisan Director take over.
